[size=46]Amal Clooney Rocks Black-and-White Jumpsuit During Night Out With George and Her Mom in Italy



by [size=14]Leena Tailor 2:08 PM PDT, August 07, 2017

















[You must be registered and logged in to see this image.]

[size=11]Photo: Backgrid [size=11]Photo: Backgrid



George and Amal Clooney took some time out from diaper duty to enjoy a lavish dinner Amal's mother, Baria, in Lake Como, Italy, on Saturday.

An eyewitness tells ET that the trio was spotted arriving at Italian eatery, Il Gatto Nero, around 9 p.m. and enjoyed a two-hour meal at the restaurant, which has stunning lake views.

[size=16]Amal looked stunning in a strapless, black-and-white striped jumpsuit, her shiny dark locks perfectly flowing amid shoulder-length earrings. in a strapless, black-and-white striped jumpsuit, her shiny dark locks perfectly flowing amid shoulder-length earrings.

EXCLUSIVE: George Clooney Is Even ‘More Protective’ Since Becoming a Father

“George and Amal were in a great mood,” the eyewitness says. “They greeted everyone and held hands as they left the restaurant. Amal looked radiant and in top form.”

[You must be registered and logged in to see this image.]

Photo: Backgrid

The night out marked some quality family time for Amal and her mother, who flew out of Lake Como the next afternoon.

[/size][/size][/size][/size]
title: Amal Clooney Enjoys Dinner Date in Italy With George Clooney and Her Mom
